title: Falcon Eye - Synthetic Vision
description: Low-cost 3D synthetic vision for fighter aircraft. Real-time OpenGL rendering, stitched terrain tiles, and deterministic failover on sub-$100 hardware.

title: Strata - Personal AI Assistant
description: YC-ready assistant unifying Gmail, Calendar, and Tasks with offline sync, long-horizon memory, and daily workflows that actually stick.

title: GhostPIN - Visual-Nonce MFA
description: Browser SDK that anchors WebAuthn, OTP, and device proofs to a visual nonce layered on checkout flows to prevent phishing and fake payment pages.

title: ShardWise - Distributed Task Engine
description: Lightweight orchestration framework that keeps research pipelines alive via adaptive sharding, leader election, and replication across nodes.

title: Semantic Task Observer
description: Multilingual reconciliation engine pairing transformer embeddings with Redis retrieval to help global teams avoid mismatched assignments.

title: Spuddie Memory System
description: Long-term memory layer for a conversational companion, blending vector databases, heuristic scoring, and reinforcement feedback for recall.

title: Expressive Voice Robot
description: Raspberry Pi 4 robotic head with synchronized speech, emotion detection, and servo choreography for convincing in-person interactions.
stack: Raspberry Pi, TensorFlow Lite, PWM servo bus

title: Global Nanobot Control
description: ESP32 and WebSockets stack for worldwide teleoperation. Adaptive buffering keeps command latency under 20 ms while preserving reliability.

title: Rocket Lab Avionics
description: Arduino-based telemetry capturing 99.99% of flight data even under extreme vibration thanks to custom PCB layouts and fault-tolerant firmware.

title: Calltender - Voice Calls for Accessibility
description: Gemini, ElevenLabs, and Twilio agent that handles phone menus for hearing-impaired users, delivering natural assistance over standard lines.

title: PhishNet - Threat Visualization
description: Real-time dashboard for phishing detection using BERT classifiers, streaming ingest, and alerting for rapid incident response.

title: BikeNav - Safer Cycling Routes
description: Mobile app combining GPS, Mapbox, and crowd-sourced safety data to chart safer urban cycling routes with offline caching.
